title: Add video posting, live streaming, and fix messaging

requirements.text: Add ability to create and post video content with captions and author selection (user or character)

quotes: I was wondering if my app can have the ability to post videos

acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload video files when creating a post
Video posts display with playback controls in the feed
Videos can be posted by the user or any of their characters
Video posts support captions like regular posts

requirements.text: Implement live streaming capability for the user and their character friends to broadcast live video

quotes: for different charicter friends and me to go live

acceptanceCriteria: Users can start a live stream session
Characters can start live stream sessions
Other users can view active live streams
Live streams are clearly indicated in the UI as 'Live'

requirements.text: Fix the messaging functionality so conversations and message sending work reliably

quotes: the messages thing isn't really working

acceptanceCriteria: Conversations load correctly in the Messages page
New messages can be sent and appear immediately in the thread
Message history persists and displays accurately
Creating new conversations works without errors

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui/*
Keep existing social features (posts, stories, comments, characters) fully functional
nonGoals: Real-time video chat or WebRTC features
